蚳蚳蚳
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 𨑉, 𧎪
Связанный символ (и): 𨑉, 𧎪

蚳字的基本解释

蚳
chí
蚁卵，古人用白色的蚁卵做酱，供食用。

蚳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chí］
［《廣韻》直尼切，平脂，澄。］
亦作“蚔1”。
(1)蚁卵。
(2)传说中的一种水中动物。
(3)姓。战国齐有蚳鼃。见《孟子·公孙丑下》。
[②]［chī］
［《集韻》稱脂切，平脂，昌。］
见“蠪蚳”。

蚳字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚳； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1079第19
【唐韻】直尼切【集韻】【韻會】陳尼切，?音遲。【玉篇】蟻卵也。【禮·內則】腵脩。蚳醢。【註】蚍蜉子也。【周禮·天官·鼈人】共蚳以授醢人。【疏】謂蟻之子，取白者以爲醢。　又【集韻】稱脂切，音鴟。蠪蚳，獸名。【山海經】昆吾之山有獸焉，其狀如彘而有角，其音如號，名曰蠪蚳。【註】蠪蚳，似九尾狐。

考證：〔【天官·鼈人】蚳醢。〕　謹照原文改鼈人共蚳以授醢人。
蚳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚳字的起名意思

暂无。

ant eggs
Basic explanation of words
ant eggs
chí
Ant eggs, the ancients used white ant eggs to make sauce for food.
ant eggs
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chí］
["Guangyun" Zhiniqie, flat fat, clear. ]
Also known as "Clam 1".
(1) Ant eggs.
(2) A legendary aquatic animal.
(3) Last name. During the Warring States period, there were worms. See "Mencius·Gongsun Chouxia".
[②]［chī］
["Jiyun" is called Zhiqie, Pingzhi, and Chang. ]
See "Punch".
ant eggs
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚳; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1079 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Zhi Niche [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Chen Niche, the sound is late. [Jade articles] Ant eggs too. 【Rite·Inner】Hui Xiu. Worm. [Note] Mayfly also. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Shui People】To teach the people together. 【Sparse】The son of the ant, the one who takes the white thinks it is 醢.　[Jiyun] It is called Zhiqie, sound 鸱. The name of the beast. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of Kunwu has beasts, its shape is like a horn with horns, its sound is like a number, and its name is worm. [Note] The beetle is like a nine-tailed fox. Textual research: [[Tianguan·Shuiren] worms. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the common people of turtles according to the original text to teach them.
